ygData.subject: Scramble, scramble!!

Sorry the post is so long, all. I have a lot to respond to. hehe. :)

* Iron Raptor decided not to really think about such things now, wondering 
slightly just where Shadow Cat and Snow Tech had gone off to. She hummed a 
slight tune on a short breath before she brough the air back in through her 
teeth, feeling the bite of the tiny little kitten. Slightly surprised that 
his teeth got through her armored hand.
The armor on it retracted and she looked at the hand, two beads of 
mech-fluid seeping out from twon holes in her finger.
Iron Raptor furrowed her browns and looked down at the kitten, using her 
other hand to give him a fairly swift smack on the bottom.*

" Don't you do that again! Bad kitty!"

* She growled but then relaxed her shoulders which had tensed up when the 
hitten had bitten her, both hands safely holding him down.
< Rotten little bugger.> so her thoughts read before she cought a flicker of 
Prowls.
He was thinking about how a first date would be like and where they could go 
for one, glad that he agreed with her thoughts on that subject and agreeing 
on his choice of atmosphere for the event too.
She was walking comfortably besides him, knowing that she DID love him but 
just needed to slow down a bit.
She was about to lean against Prowl more but he chose then to take his arm 
away from her waist and she was left to catch herself from falling, grasping 
the kitten to her chest in slight panic before she got her balence back. 
Brining in a sigh of relief she looked down at the kitten, loosening her 
hold and hoping that she hadn't squished him.
All of them were well into the CF now, Iron blinking slightly and waiting 
for her spark to slow down. THAT...had really frightened her for a moment, 
but knowing why Prowl had let go of her.
It was a lonely feeling but one she brought on by thinking that they should 
slow down...even though she hadn't meant that much. Though, if Prowl thought 
it was best then she wasn't pushing it.
But she glanced at Prowl when he actually asked her out on a date, thinking 
that he sounded like he was trying to start all over again. Nervouse even 
though they had been throygh much more.
< Yes.>she thought. Accepting his offer while looking back ahead of herself 
as they walked along, stroking the kitten even though she had slapped him 
moments before.
She began to pass the bridge when a sidden flash of movement cought her 
attention, looking into the room and at the video screen that seemed to jump 
to life.
She squinted at first when she looked at the screen but the brightness faded 
and she could focus.
She was shocked to hear what came next.
WildWing's voice boomed over the speakers, snapping her int attention.
The Ark was being attacked?!
That wasn't new news since they were always under attack but if that ship 
wasn't saved then all of the transformers might cease to exist, her 
excluded.
Iron Raptor knew that she was no space fighter and standed no chance there, 
but there were others, many who could.
She looked at Prowl, making decisions at lightnibg speed.
Iron Raptor slammed her fist into a button that activated the red alert all 
across the ship, activating a ship wide camm channel as well*

" Maximals! The Ark is being attacked in space and we're going up. Fuel all 
shuttles and board, countdown will commence in 10 cycles. Go!"

* she turned to Prowl.
< I need you to take command of them up there, space is not my realm. Alert 
them of this and board. Now go, quickly.>
Iron Raptor then turned and opened a comm to Hysteria.*

" Hysteria, you and I are going to watch the launches from the command room. 
We'll monitor them from here, also see if you can get me a diagnostic of the 
Ark. I wanna see everything that happens when it happens."
